subject: Re: [junit] JUnit And Static Class Variables In VM - HELP !
msgSnippet: ... To what aim are you using static variables in mock objects in the first place? Maybe there s another (better) solution... Johannes -- GMX - Die
messageBody:
> What else do you expect to happen with the static class variables.
> There will ever only be one instance of them in the JVM, period.
>
> Why not reset them to their initial state in your TestCase.setUp().

To what aim are you using static variables in mock objects in the first
place? Maybe there's another (better) solution...

Johannes
